pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:0.5: 58. The training rule on the instruction
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying in the Sakyan country at Kapilavatthu in the Banyan Tree Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.2: the monks from the group of six went to the nuns’ dwelling place to instruct the nuns from the group of six.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.3: Soon afterwards other nuns said to those nuns,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.4: “Come, Venerables, let’s go to the instruction.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.5: “There’s no need. The monks from the group of six came and instructed us right here.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.6: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.7: “How can the nuns from the group of six not go to the instruction?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns didn’t do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.11: “… How can the nuns from the group of six not do this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.14.1: ‘If a nun does not go to the instruction or take part in a formal meeting of the community, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.1.8: joint legal procedures, a joint recitation, the same training.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.1.9: If she thinks, “I won’t go to the instruction or take part in a formal meeting of the community,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.2.3: if she searches for a companion nun, but does not find one;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.2.7: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.2.8: The eighth training rule is finished.
